item.description:
Emerald Lake has long been a place of curiosity. At night, strange lights glow in the deepest waters- some say that the spirit of the lake is angry, some say that the people on the bottom of the lake are preparing for a war on the land dwellers. Nobody knows for certain, but you can find out. Take on the role of a fantasy hero and help unravel the mystery in an evening of foam sword-fighting and adventure.


Pre Reg: $15/members and friends $25/nonmembers
At Door: $25/members and friends $35/nonmembers

Waiver Required for all non-members
Contact Us to Pre-Register
item.name: Adventure Night Still Waters
